title: Water delivery in Limassol
water_delivery: We deliver water bottles from 9 AM to 5 PM from Monday to Saturday.
log_in_with_phone: Log in with your phone number and fill in the form to make an order!
one_bottle_price: 7 euros if you order one bottle
order_2-9: 6 euros — per each, if you order 2 to 9 bottles
order_more_than_10: more than 10 bottles — price is negotiable.
message_us_1: If you encounter any issues with an online order or want to return a deposit, please
water_characteristics: We deliver Mersini Spring Water, which is bottled at source within minutes of leaving the ground, always under constant quality control, following strict HACCP protocol as well as E.U. specifications
deposite: For the first delivery, we take a deposit for bottles, it will be returned if you decide to stop ordering our water.
one_bottle_deposite: The deposit for one bottle — is 7 euros.
login_window: Log in to make an order
placeholder_OTP: Please enter the OTP code you have received in sms
OTP_messages_otpSent: OTP code is already sent to your phone number
OTP_messages_otpSentError: Something went wrong, reload the page or try later
OTP_messages_wrongOtp: The OTP code you’ve entered is incorrect. Check it and try again
format_number: Please enter your phone number in the format: +357 12 567890
wrong_otp: The OTP code you’ve entered is incorrect. Check it and try again
enter_phone_with_code: Enter your full phone number starting with the country code
title_tag: DelAqua – Water delivery in Limassol, Cyprus
description_tag: We do water delivery of 19l bottles to homes and offices in Limassol (Cyprus) from 9 AM to 5 PM from Monday to Saturday. 6 euros for each 19l bottle. We deliver Mersini Spring Water, which is bottled at the source within minutes of leaving the ground.
paymentWarning: Your payment for delivery is awaiting to be paid. Pay via the link.
sureCancel: Are you sure you want to cancel this order?
info: Please note that Tuesday, October 1st is a day off. Kindly place your orders for an alternative date. Thank you for your understanding!
